pageContent: Background: The authors investigated the prevalence of pretreatment urinary, sexual, hormonal, and bowel dysfunction in a contemporary, population-based prostate cancer cohort. They also explored the associations between baseline function and age, comorbidity, and timing of baseline survey completion with respect to treatment.

metaData.source:
The role and structure of a postradical prostatectomy penile rehabilitation program
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19371480/
